alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:09PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Custer, central Butte and southwestern Clark Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles northwest of Northwest Inl to 10 miles northeast of Darlington to near Grouse. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arco, Darlington, Craters Of The Moon, Moore, Butte City and Lone Pine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
